channel.title: Batch filz that run other batch filz.....(HELP)!
channel.description: Ok. So i have a voule restarter which i'm verrrrry happy with. its great. and alls i want different is for it to run voule.js....thats not going to happen though. *- SO -* i need to edit my voule.bat so it runz voule.js *- EXAMPLE / LIKE -* the file would say run voule.js ....... it didn't w0rk though...anyboyd have suggestionz?

item.title: Batch filz that run other batch filz.....(HELP)!
item.dc:creator: @Adelmas Adelmas
item.description:
@Adelmas wrote:

@echo off
title Voule
color 0c
echo =========
echo Starting Voule auto restarter…
echo =========
start C:\Path\Goes\Here\Filehere.extentionhere
cls
color 0a
echo =========
echo Voule auto restarter was started successfully!
echo =========
pause
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Batch filz that run other batch filz.....(HELP)!
